name: Adventure Astronaut
description:
This is my 3D Platformer final project.

The modifications:

1. New enemy: The boss

The boss has three weapons, two high damage red projectile shooters, and one relatively low damage green projectile shooter. When the boss's blood is lower than 2/3, one weapon system will break; lower than 1/3, the second weapon system will break. 

2. The moving walls

3. New background music for the main menu, Level 2, 3, and 4.

4. Improved Main Menu scene.

5. New Levels with new mechanics 

Created by Xiangyu Meng (孟祥宇）

Thanks to Ziyu Hao for helping me improved my background music creation.
